coreAttributes.authorTag: An insignia discreetly stitched into the skirt's washing instructions tag informs you that someone by the name of 'Boondock' did the tailoring.
coreAttributes.name: Enforcer's taur-skirt
coreAttributes.description: A specially-designed enforcer skirt, suitable to be fit onto the lower body of any taur race.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the taur-skirt down over [npc.her] head, before allowing it to settle into place over [npc.her] [npc.legRace]'s body and buckling the duty belt.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the enforcer taur-skirt down over [npc2.namePos] head, before allowing it to settle into place over [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body and buckle's the duty belt.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] the enforcer taur-skirt down over [npc2.namePos] head, before firmly pulling it down over [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body and tightly buckles the duty belt around their waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] enforcer taur-skirt, and unbuckles the duty belt before pulling it up and over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc2.namePos] enforcer taur-skirt, and unbuckle's the duty belt before pulling it up and over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] enforcer taur-skirt, before yanking it up and over [npc2.her] head without unbuckling the duty belt.
